welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miren, Slovenia! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city, known for its stunning landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Miren has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
